import Mathlib

noncomputable abbrev putnam_1986_a3_solution : ℝ := sorry
-- Real.pi / 2
/--
Evaluate $\sum_{n=0}^\infty \mathrm{Arccot}(n^2+n+1)$, where $\mathrm{Arccot}\,t$ for $t \geq 0$ denotes the number $\theta$ in the interval $0 < \theta \leq \pi/2$ with $\cot \theta = t$.
-/
theorem putnam_1986_a3
(cot : ℝ → ℝ)
(fcot : cot = fun θ ↦ cos θ / sin θ)
(arccot : ℝ → ℝ)
(harccot : ∀ t : ℝ, t ≥ 0 → arccot t ∈ Set.Ioc 0 (Real.pi / 2) ∧ cot (arccot t) = t)
: (∑' n : ℕ, arccot (n ^ 2 + n + 1) = putnam_1986_a3_solution) :=

```lean4
theorem putnam_1986_a3
(cot : ℝ → ℝ)
(fcot : cot = fun θ ↦ cos θ / sin θ)
(arccot : ℝ → ℝ)
(harccot : ∀ t : ℝ, t ≥ 0 → arccot t ∈ Set.Ioc 0 (Real.pi / 2) ∧ cot (arccot t) = t)
: (∑' n : ℕ, arccot (n ^ 2 + n + 1) = putnam_1986_a3_solution) := by
  have h₁ := harccot 0 (by norm_num)
  have h₂ := harccot 1 (by norm_num)
  have h₃ := harccot 2 (by norm_num)
  have h₄ := harccot 3 (by norm_num)
  have h₅ := harccot 4 (by norm_num)
  have h₆ := harccot 5 (by norm_num)
  have h₇ := harccot 6 (by norm_num)
  have h₈ := harccot 7 (by norm_num)
  have h₉ := harccot 8 (by norm_num)
  have h₁₀ := harccot 9 (by norm_num)
  have h₁₁ := harccot 10 (by norm_num)
  simp_all [fcot, cot, arccot, Set.mem_Ioc]
  <;> norm_num at *
  <;> linarith [Real.pi_pos]
  <;> aesop
```
